message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product. I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $15,000. What do you think?
Alice, $15,000 is a bit steep for me. I'm really interested in the product, but my budget is closer to $8,000. Would you be willing to come down to $9,000?

I understand you're looking to save some money, Bob. However, I've got to make a profit on this deal. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need $12,000 to make it worth my while. How about we meet at $12,000?
